description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're continuing with the workshops! We will be alternating them with talks, hoping to create a theme that connects the two from here on.

Theme: Web Servers in Go

On top of this theme we encourage you to bring your own problems and we can work through them together.

The task:
- Create a simple webserver with the standard library
- Create tests that call the server
- Dockerise the server

Plan:
- 18:00 - Arrive anytime after
- 18:30. - Intro and pizza
- 18.45 - Get Started
- 20:00 - Finish up

🍺 As always, afterwards we will be heading to a pub for a little .

📣 We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout!

📣Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

📍 - Runway East - Bristol Bridge
🍕 - TBD
title: Go Workshop
